com.impinj.octane

Class LocationConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.impinj.octane.LocationConfig

  • public class LocationConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    A container that holds all of the configuration options for xArray location

    • Method Detail

      • getComputeWindowSeconds

        public short getComputeWindowSeconds()
        Compute Window the the smoothing window for averaging the location estimates. Default is 10 seconds.
        Returns:
        the current value of the compute window

      • setComputeWindowSeconds

        public void setComputeWindowSeconds(short computeWindowSeconds)
        Compute Window the the smoothing window for averaging the location estimates. Default is 10 seconds.
        Parameters:
        computeWindowSeconds - the desired value for the compute window

      • getTagAgeIntervalSeconds

        public short getTagAgeIntervalSeconds()
        The Age Interval specifies how long a tag needs to go unseen before its removed from the location tracking. Default is 20 seconds.
        Returns:
        the current value for the tag Age Interval.

      • setTagAgeIntervalSeconds

        public void setTagAgeIntervalSeconds(short tagAgeIntervalSeconds)
        The Age Interval specifies how long a tag needs to go unseen before its removed from the location tracking. Default is 20 seconds.
        Parameters:
        tagAgeIntervalSeconds - the desired value for the tag age interval

      • getUpdateIntervalSeconds

        public short getUpdateIntervalSeconds()
        The UpdateInterval specifies how often tag reports are generated when tag report updates are enabled
        Returns:
        the current value of the Report Interval.
        See Also:
        setUpdateReportEnabled(boolean)

      • setUpdateIntervalSeconds

        public void setUpdateIntervalSeconds(short updateIntervalSeconds)
        The ReportInterval specifies how often tag reports are generated when tag report updates are enabled
        Parameters:
        updateIntervalSeconds - the time between report generation in seconds
        See Also:
        setUpdateReportEnabled(boolean)

      • isUpdateReportEnabled

        public boolean isUpdateReportEnabled()
        When update reports are enabled, location reports are sent by the reader periodically for all tags in the location database
        Returns:
        true if the update report is enabled
        See Also:
        LocationReport

      • setUpdateReportEnabled

        public void setUpdateReportEnabled(boolean updateReportEnabled)
        Parameters:
        updateReportEnabled - desired update report state
        See Also:
        LocationReport

      • isEntryReportEnabled

        public boolean isEntryReportEnabled()
        When enabled, an entry report is sent immediately upon the tag entering the field of view of the reader.
        Returns:
        true if entry reports are enabled.
        See Also:
        LocationReport

      • setEntryReportEnabled

        public void setEntryReportEnabled(boolean entryReportEnabled)
        When enabled, an entry report is sent immediately upon the tag entering the field of view of the reader.
        Parameters:
        entryReportEnabled - true to enable entry reports
        See Also:
        LocationReport

      • isExitReportEnabled

        public boolean isExitReportEnabled()
        When enabled, an exit report is generated when the tag has not been seen by the reader in the tag age Interval.
        Returns:
        true if enabled
        See Also:
        setTagAgeIntervalSeconds(short), LocationReport

      • setExitReportEnabled

        public void setExitReportEnabled(boolean exitReportEnabled)
        When enabled, an exit report is generated when the tag has not been seen by the reader in the tag age Interval.
        Parameters:
        exitReportEnabled - true to enable exit reports
        See Also:
        LocationReport

      • isDiagnosticReportEnabled

        public boolean isDiagnosticReportEnabled()
        When enabled, diagnostic reports are generated at each update interval and sent to the application
        Returns:
        true if diagnostic reports are enabled
        See Also:
        LocationReport

      • setDiagnosticReportEnabled

        public void setDiagnosticReportEnabled(boolean diagnosticReportEnabled)
        When enabled, diagnostic reports are generated at each update interval and sent to the application
        Parameters:
        diagnosticReportEnabled - true to enable diagnostic reports
        See Also:
        LocationReport

      • getIsMaxTxPower

        public java.lang.Boolean getIsMaxTxPower()
        Typically an antenna is set to maximum transmit power. This provides the longest read range. However, maximum transmit power can be disabled and the power can be controlled via setTxPower.
        Returns:
        true if antennas are set to operate at maximum power

      • setIsMaxTxPower

        public void setIsMaxTxPower(java.lang.Boolean maxTxPower)
        Typically an antenna is set to maximum transmit power. This provides the longest read range. However, maximum transmit power can be disabled and the power can be controlled via setTxPower.
        Parameters:
        maxTxPower - -- true to set antenna power to maximum. false to allow the power to be varied by the setTxPowerinDbm method.

      • getTxPowerinDbm

        public double getTxPowerinDbm()
        Transmit power can be adjusted on antennas to reduce the read range of the antenna. Transmit power is specified in dBm (decibel milliwatts)
        Returns:
        the current antenna transmit power in dBm

      • setTxPowerinDbm

        public void setTxPowerinDbm(double txPowerinDbm)
        Transmit power can be adjusted on antennas to reduce the read range of the antenna. Transmit power is specified in dBm (decibel milliwatts)
        Parameters:
        txPowerinDbm - -- antenna power in dBm

      • getDisabledAntennaList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Short> getDisabledAntennaList()
        Antennas can be disabled when configuring location. Get the list of currently disabled antennas.
        Returns:
        the list of currently disabled antennas

      • setDisabledAntennaList

        public void setDisabledAntennaList(java.util.List<java.lang.Short> disabledAntennaList)
        Antennas can be disabled when configuring location. Set the list of currently disabled antennas.
        Parameters:
        disabledAntennaList - -- the list of antennas to be disabled

      • setDisabledAntennaList

        public void setDisabledAntennaList(short[] disabledAntennaArray)
        Antennas can be disabled when configuring location. Set the list of currently disabled antennas.
        Parameters:
        disabledAntennaArray - -- an array of antennas to be disabled
